computeCSV(String, ParsedDocument) - Method in class modnlp.tc.classify.BVBayes
CSV_i(d_j) = \sum_0^T tkj log p(t|c) * (1 - p(t|?c) / p(t|?c) * (1 - p(t|c) (where tkj \in {0, 1} is the binary weight at position k in vector d_j; multiplying by it causes terms that do not occur in the document to be ignored) Disadvantage of this approach: larger documents receive disproportionally large CSV's simply by virtue of containing more terms.
computeCSV(String, ParsedDocument) - Method in class modnlp.tc.classify.DSNormalisedBayes
CSV_i(d_j) = \sum_0^T tkj log p(t|c) * (1 - p(t|?c) / p(t|?c) * (1 - p(t|c) (where tkj \in {0, 1} is the binary weight at position k in vector d_j; multiplying by it causes terms that do not occur in the document to be ignored)
